item.title: Gemini Launches ETH and Solana Staking in the EU, Introduces USDC-Priced Perpetual Futures
item.description: On September 5th, the cryptocurrency exchange Gemini declared the initiation of ETH and Solana staking services within the European Union, without imposing a minimum amount requirement. The SOL annual rewards are capable of reaching up to 6%, while ETH provides a variable yield. Gemini also presented perpetual contracts priced in USDC, featuring a leverage of up to 100x and having no expiration date. This action is founded on Gemini's acquisition of MiCA compliance approval.

item.title: The US Dollar Index (DXY) has retreated below 98, down 0.30% intraday
item.description: On September 5th, the US Dollar Index (DXY) dropped below 98, with an intraday decline of 0.30%. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Bitcoin Withdrawal Trend Continues, with a Net Outflow of 4,355.10 BTC from CEX in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 5th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, there has been a net outflow of 4,355.10 BTC from CEX. The top three exchanges with outflows are as follows:· Kraken, with an outflow of 7,135.39 BTC;· OKX, with an outflow of 823.72 BTC;· Gemini, with an outflow of 413.17 BTC.In addition, Coinbase Pro witnessed an inflow of 3,350.11 BTC and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: The new address increased its holdings with an average price of $4315, acquiring 15,256.6 ETH. The current unrealized gain is approximately $1.3 million.
item.description: On September 5th, according to the monitoring of on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, a new address 0xAF8...8504c has accumulated 15,256.6 ETH, which is worth 65.84 million US dollars. In the past 11 hours, this address withdrew 15,256.6 ETH from OKX at an average price of $4315. Currently, it is holding an unrealized gain of $1.296 million.

item.title: A certain new address has gone 10x long on PEPE and WIF, with a total position size of $4.5 million.
item.description: On September 5th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a particular trader has just established a new wallet address and transferred 701,000 USDC into Hyperliquid. Subsequently, they went long on PEPE and WIF with a 10x leverage.Position:· 258 million kPEPE ($2.5 million)· 2.47 million WIF ($2 million)The new address is conjectured by the community to be James Wynn's address; however, there is currently no additional evidence to verify this.

item.title: A Whale Acquires Over 10,000 ETH on OTC Platform
item.description: On September 5th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, on the eve of the release of non-farm payroll data, a whale address received 10,039 ETH from Galaxy Digital, with a value of $44.04 million.Address: 0x829a0222379b6edbaf7e7081f00d3ac42f9dffaf.

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Trend Continues, with a CEX Net Outflow of 48,200 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 5th, according to Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, there has been a net outflow of 48,200 ETH from CEX. The top three outflow exchanges are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 57,200 ETH;· Bybit, with an outflow of 5,820.42 ETH;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 3,853.37 ETH.Furthermore, KuCoin saw an inflow of 6,094.13 ETH and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: Binance Wallet's new TGE STAR will launch on September 6th
item.description: September 5th. Binance Wallet launched the 37th exclusive TGE Starpower (STAR), which was carried out through Pancake Swap.Subscription Period: From 08:00 to 10:00 on September 6, 2025 (UTC).Eligibility Requirement: Users are required to use Binance Alpha Points to participate.Additional Rewards: The upcoming event will offer 17,500,000 STAR tokens, and the details will be announced soon.

item.title: ChainOpera AI is pleased to announce the start of its first visit to China. Renowned scholar and co-founder Salman along with Aiden will be in attendance.
item.description: On September 5th, the world-leading "AI+Blockchain" integration project ChainOpera's China tour is about to arrive in Shanghai and Hangzhou. This project focuses on "Collaborative Intelligence" and has more than 3 million users, over 100,000 developers, and thousands of GPU nodes. Its flagship application previously topped the BSC chain's AI DApp daily ranking.The event will be held on September 6th (Saturday) from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM in Shanghai and on September 7th (Sunday) from 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM in Hangzhou. The event will analyze cutting-edge developments such as multi-agent collaboration and the Proof of Intelligence (PoI) mechanism, discuss AI's innovation in DeFi, creative and other scenarios, and provide opportunities for developers, the community, and capital to connect. Additionally, the project's co-founders, renowned scholars, member of the US National Academy of Engineering and Dean of the USC Viterbi School of Engineering, Dr. Salman Avestimehr, along with the founder o

item.title: LookOnChain: Ethereum Surges Above $4400
item.description: On September 5th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum experienced a rebound and broke through $4400, registering a 24-hour gain of 0.84%.
